name: Halo Healthy Glow Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 25 with Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: An all-in-one, SPF primer-infused tinted moisturizer with lightweight, natural-looking dewy coverage that hydrates skin for up to 24 hours...Coverage: Light..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Liquid..Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..SPF: SPF 30 and Under..Highlighted Ingredients:.- SPF 25: Protects against environmental aggressors and sun damage.- Hyaluronic Acid: Moisturizes for up to 24 hours to help plump and promote supple skin..Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Primer-infused for all-day wear and a healthy glow, this skin tint primes, perfects, protects, and hydrates. It has rose extract, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, goji berries, gold, and peptides. The breathable, vegan, and oil-free formula moisturizes, conditions, and protects...Clinical Results:.- Moisturizes skin for up to 24 hours -.Helps plump and promote supple skin through hydration.- Does not strip the skin’s moisture barrier.- Sweat and humidity-resistant.- Lightweight, natural-looking coverage that still looks like skin.- Made for all skintypes and won’t cause breakouts.- SPF 25 for everyday protection against environmental aggressors, sun damage and against future visible signs of aging.- Won’t crease, cake, or settle into fine lines
ingredients: -Octinoxate 6.7%, Titanium Dioxide 3.1%, Zinc Oxide 1.3%: Sunscreens.....Water\Aqua\Eau, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Methyl Trimethicone, Niacinamide, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Diethylhexyl Succinate, Laureth-4, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Rosa Hybrid Flower Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Lycium Chinense (Wolfberry) Fruit Extract, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-14, Peat Extract, Gold, Sodium Lactate, Methicone, Sodium PCA, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein/PVP Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Barium Sulfate, Magnesium Sulfate, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Maltodextrin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Dimethicone Crosspolymer-3, Silica, Aluminum Hydroxide, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hexylene Glycol, Isostearic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Dipentaerythrityl Tri-Polyhydroxystearate, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, BHT, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163)]...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Step 1: Shake well. .- Step 2: Tap on with fingers and blend. .- Studio Tip: Use it as a tinted primer or layer under powder or foundation.

reviews.review_text: I am on my 3rd purchase of this BEAUTIFUL tinted moisturizer. I have combo skin, more on the dry side and my skin looks amazing with this. Light coverage and dewy, it is perfect for everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On my third purchase! I use this product on an almost daily basis right after cleansing and moisturizing with my normal face moisturizer. I have relatively clear skin to start, and this product helps even out redness/blotchiness, but it will not cover up major blemishes. It's not a foundation. Concealer, liquid blush and powders blend very nicely over top of this product, and it washes off easily as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have slightly dry skin, but after using Halo Healthy Glow Tinted Moisturizer in Light Medium, I feel confident and better looking. It provides a natural, dewy finish and hydrates my skin with hyaluronic acid. The light-medium shade with a neutral undertone blends seamlessly, giving me a healthy glow and even complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first time trying tint ever and I chose correct! Love the coverage, tint and luminous look this gives on my skin. This is the perfect summer coverage. I don't have to use a lot and it blends well.

reviews.review_title: The Best Tinted Moisturizer I've Tried

reviews.review_text: I love this so much! It evens up my skin tone and doesn't feel heavy or greasy. This shade is perfect for me as well being very fair. I love how natural-looking it looks. It's my skin but better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I love this tinted moisturizer. It glides on well, stays on all day and gives good coverage.  It does not have a smell which is a huge factor for me.  I tried other tinted moisturizers and I keep going back to this same one, I have two colours for the different seasons. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new FAVOURITE complexion product. It still has decent coverage but it feels like there’s nothing on my skin. keeps me looking fresh and glowing all day, and lasts with minimal- no touch ups!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oxidizes so bad. Looks fine when I first apply, but makes me very orange after it sets (even when prepping skin and using setting spray). I also find it drying as it wears throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Neutral - Light with a neutral undertone

reviews.review_text: Terrible!! This product was the culprit of me breaking out in perioral dermatitis! I had no idea. I used the CC Cream my whole life and never had issues. I just bought this and started breaking out but didn’t make the connection at first. This product is the worst for break outs! I loved the CC cream and now I don’t know what product to use since that was my holy grail. This one is a hard no. What a shame!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This tinted moisturizer is a holy grail for me. I cannot be without it. I am a busy student and mother of 3. This is perfect for quick application before you run out the door. Leaves your skin GLOWING

reviews.review_title: Don't think I'll ever stop using this

The finish is dewy perfection and I constantly get compliments on my skin when I'm wearing this.  Only critique would be make sure you're wearing a gripping primer underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Je l'adore et je le compare avec le sérum teintée Ilia. Très naturel, mais pas jolie avec un primer. Je préfère le mettre sur une peau bien hydratée. Ce n'est pas pour cacher les grosses imperfections, ce n'est pas un fond de teint. Illumine et unifie le teint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been looking for a cc/bb cream with spf. This is great as it's matte! However I find the base of this quiet orange even though i purchased a light neutral. Little goes a long way!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate the feel of heavy products on my face but also needed a little coverage so opted to buy this tinted moisturizer. I absolutely LOVE it. It's so lightweight, non-greasy, and a little goes such a long way so I'm happy I got my money's worth. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tinted moisturizer. It’s the perfect glow that I need and that I like. I have dry skin, it just sits well on my face. The shade was perfect too. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t even count the amount of foundations and tinted moisturizers I’ve tried. This is the best. I have combo skin, and this gives the perfect amount of sheer glow without looking oily or shimmery. I don’t even have to set this.
Hydrate bien et donne un éclat à la peau. Couvre bien sans être trop opaque. Parfait pour les maquillages subtils et lorsqu’on ne veut pas quelques chose de trop lourd sur le visage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a lighter coverage foundation with SPF that wasn't mattifying and had some glow. The Sephora employee recommended this to me. It was a good colour match for me so I bought it but won't be repurchasing. It is not glowy at ALL. it isn't quite matte, but almost.

reviews.review_title: Glowy and lovely, with some caveats
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this! I own what feels like every tinted moisturizer/light coverage foundation/serum foundation on the market and this is my favorite. It is very luminous but not necessarily as hydrating as I thought although I don’t mind as I have moved to a more humid area. In very dry areas I’d avoid this product.  Tips: Definitely check in store before you buy as it oxidizes noticeably.  Not super moisturizing, get the Ilia in the dropper bottle for a similar but extra moisturizing product. Perhaps a bit more coverage than other tinted moisturizers, for less coverage go with Bare Minerals or Fenty or for super duper light Glossier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about six months now and there's been pros and cons. Pros: I love the luminous but not oily look it gives initially, as well as the coverage. The SPF is also a great addition to this product. Cons: my skin tends to be on the more oily side, and powder is a necessity with this product so I don't look sweaty after a couple of hours. My shade tends to run on the more yellowy side, so I couldn't add a lot without looking yellow. After a while, I switched it out for the Marcelle natural bb cream in fair, which has more benefits and a better price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There is nothing moisturizing about this tinted moisturizer.  And, while I like a tinted moisturizer because it should be lighter than foundation, this is heavier than my foundation. The sales clerk told me it was a satin finish but it is very matte. The only thing I like about it is the colour. It is hard to find good pale neutral colours and it is that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product, I don’t LOVE it though. It goes on smoothly and creates a dewy glow. I do feel like I have to use an oil blotting sheet like two hours after applying and then I’m fine for the rest of the day. I can’t seem to get the correct shade so I’ve been mixing two colors (my fall/spring shade with my summer shade) and that helps match my skin tone the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light, covers well and I would not use to much because I found a little went a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice finish, but it oxidizes like CRAZY. The undertone began to look more orange. I mix it in lighter foundations to darken them a bit. Again, nice finish, but still oxidizes. I’m usually fine with that and can deal with it, but this  is… another level

reviews.review_title: Oily, break out, weird yellow undertone.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the sample and loved it! Went ahead and bought the whole product and things turned for the worse… I began to break out with acne after wearing this product on all day. The product has a weird yellow undertone  and the pridct pools up in spots. My face was really oily. The undertone was very yellow. Returned the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes! It took me a few tries to get the application right. I use a medium density brush and then pat in with hands if needed. Looks beautiful with a primer that has some glow in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hopeful I would like this product and it has a pretty nice consistency and has way more coverage than i thought it would which was nice! But the reason for the low review is because it gave me SERIOUS acne. I’m talking deep huge pimples that feel like bruises and I am someone who never has any kind of breakouts. I know it was this product that was breaking me out because I tested it 4 different times on nights out. It held up and looked nice while i wore it but it’s not worth the painful breakout!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Does nothing for me. Very watery and offers almost zero coverage. Been looking for a new tinted moisturizer ever since Laura Mercier reformulated, and so far the best I can come up with is YSL Bare Look, which sadly doesn't offer any sun protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's an everyday makeup look! I use smash box foundation but it’s full coverage and I want something light to medium and this is perfect! And SPF add bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful coverage, I used this with the halo primer and it really warmed my pasty, pale pink skin up to match my neck and chest. I'm not using a beauty filter, just love the radiant finish this provides.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it! Have worn it both with and without the Smashbox Photo Finish Smooth & Blur Primer, and both the times my face looked great. It's perfect for a dewy, healthy looking, no makeup, natural finish look - which was exactly what I wanted to go for. With the primer, I was able to build it up a bit more on some problematic areas. I have a combination skin with dry patches in some parts - I did notice that without the primer it clumped a bit on those parts - however I noticed that immediately when I applied it and exfoliated those parts a bit, put my regular drugstore moisturizer, and then topped it off with the product again. For those with dry skin like mine, would recommend using the product along with moisturizer, a light primer, and then the this. Otherwise, really loved the product. I like the sleek packaging and quantity is pretty good too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was not really impressed by this. Maybe it’s my skin type (dry skin, especially on my nose and forehead) but I didn’t feel like this was hydrating. It performed strangely on my skin by clinging to dry patches and emphasizing my dry skin while simultaneously looking and feeling greasy if I don’t thoroughly powder it down. It does feel light on the face but it just looks… bad. If you don’t powder it like I mentioned it transfers with even the lightest touch and it doesn’t stay put. Maybe this will work better for people with even skin texture but for people who just want a quick makeup routine with no fuss, this might not be worth the hassle.

reviews.review_title: A Nice natural look yet covers well.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently saw a review of this on You Tube and got a sample from Sephora.  My girl helped me pick two colors so I could determine my best match.  I was so impressed, I returned to Sephora to purchase and couldn't be more pleased.  It's got SPF, and Hyaluronic Acid and covers well but looks like my own skin, not makeup!  I am 77 and don't want a heavy makeup look, but have to cover some imperfections.  This does it all for me.

reviews.review_title: Offers a natural, dewy finish but can be drying
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a sample of this kicking around that I finally tried and fell in love, then purchased the full size. There are many shades to choose from and the Fair Light matches my skin perfectly. The moisturizer imparts light coverage and a nice glow - glowy, but not glittery - while providing SPF coverage. The only downer is despite this containing hyaluronic acid, I find it to be a bit drying on my combination skin if I don't prep my face first with a healthy dose of moisturizer. I have large pores and fine lines, and this does not settle into them. If you have dry skin this may not be the best option for you, but overall it's a great tinted moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love, I will buy again and can't say enough about how awesome this is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was nervous bc a lot of tinted moisturizers and such aren’t always a good balance of light coverage and texture. Was looking specifically for SPF as well.   This product checks all the boxes for me. The finish is really nice and I don’t feel heavily made up at all. Has a makeup free look. Will definitely keep using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly so good. I apply it immediately after my moisturizer (watermelon glow), whilst still tacky and it goes on flawlessly. I look dewy and not dry at all. I can't get enough of this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was just okay.  It was sort of glowy, but oddly, it emphasized any bit of texture on my face like pores, fine lines--which I don't really have--but it made it look like I did.  It just wasn't that great on my skin.  It also leaned too yellow and didn't seem to be that neutral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: lovely for a person with fair skin. sheer coverage that helps make my skin look flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG this product is just amazing!  I wanted something light for summer and this is it.  It goes on thicker but doesn't end up cakey at all.  I look tan and radiant and have been asked what I changed in my makeup routine.  I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tinted moisturizer is my favorite - a great light coverage option (with spf!) that I wear both alone or under makeup. Looks great as a base and works well as a primer but I also wear it on its own or even just with a little bronzer/blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this tinted moisturizer and have purchased a winter and a summer shade to be able to use it year round. While it isn't the most full-coverage, it is buidable, non-irritatung, and has a lovely natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this randomly as a replacement to the Bare minerals stick foundation with spf. I’m super happy with it. Medium coverage, very dewy and blends easily. I will repurchase.

reviews.review_title: The Best tinted moisturizer with SPF I’ve used ye
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only tinted moisturizer I use. It’s just enough colour and has SPF. I’m extremely fair and this isn’t too dark or orange like other tints. I use it under foundation for an extra glow and coverage sometimes. I’ve tried many others but I always come back to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this! I found it to be really easy to blend and so far hasn't broken up when I have used it (I will update if this changes).  Only weird thing is that I found it to be more matte than dewy. I have super dry skin, so I used this product over moisturizer, oil, and SuperGoop Play (which if you've used it, you know it is VERY dewy) and then didn't use any powder/makeup over top. I noticed almost immediately that it took down a lot of the excessive glow from the sunscreen/oil. I am not saying this is a bad thing, just that if you are buying it specifically to give a glow there is probably a product that gives more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of tinted moisturizer/lightweight makeup products and this stuff is great, but it almost reminds me of a lightweight or light coverage foundation. So if you're looking for something sheer and somewhat watery, pretty much just like a moisturizer, this stuff won't be for you. Try the Nars one (my other favorite). This gives a lightly matte, subtle glow without looking greasy and allows my skin to feel hydrated and breathable. The shade also matches my skin perfectly, they have a decent shade range. I'll be wearing this year around in summer and winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s got amazing feel and texture. Good for all weather conditions

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great tinted moisturizer! It's lightweight, but also provides the right amount of coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the old Smashbox tinted BB/CC cream whatever it was. It was discontinued and replaced by this. the HALO formula is thinner than the old, more watery. I definitely like the finish of this, very dewy and light. Which is what I go for most days. Sometimes I do miss the finish of the old version. I do think this is great for an everyday easy look. I will be rebuying it because I am not sure if there is another tinted moisturizer out there I will like but I still miss the old verison.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super light weight, BUT amazing coverage. Glides on smoothly  on face. Adds a nice healthy glow to your everyday makeup look. LOVED IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my fav tinted moisturizer !!! it’s so natural looking & is very comfortable on the skin. it’s like i have nothing on!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was easily applied but did none matched my skin shade. Decided to try at home under normal light conditions, and it was very orange and wouldn’t absorb into my skin. Would like to try again to see if a different routine might help. But alas, needed to return before getting the chance. Did not purchase at Sephora. They have a much better return policy! Won’t buy anywhere but Sephora next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This is a good everyday moisturizer with a bit of coverage, I like to add setting powder on top to get a bit more coverage! Although, it's definitely not enough SPF, especially if you're using products such as retinols or AHAs the night before/day of!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Best tinted moisturizer I've tried so far

reviews.review_text: This is my go to everyday foundation. I layer it on top of my day cream and it is just opaque enough to hide redness (from sensitivity) without looking Cakey. The finish is really perfect. It lets enough of your own skin show through to look natural and just a bit dewy.  I've also tried the It Cosmetics CC cream, the Bare Minerals CC cream, and the AmorePacific colour control cushion compact. This is the only tinted moisturizer that I have really felt good in!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used smashbox for years and love their loose powders. When my favorite tinted moisturizer was reformulated I absolutely hated it so decided to try this. I love it! Good coverage and I love that it is not oily even though it has an SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried many top brands. With my sensitive skin I had decided to just purchase Clinique’s Even Better Refresh Hydrate (no sunscreen) for winter, however, rep suggested this instead with sunscreen. Clinique’s CC cream with sunscreen I used in summer, but seemed more drying with weather change (and sunscreen started to bother my chin with mask on). Halo is better for sure - nice BB texture with a good finish on skin - Clinique’s Even Better looked more pasty on my mature skin. Halo has a nice glow, no pores visible, healthy looking younger skin, no break outs or dryness. I place a small amount on palm and spread around then apply a light coating to face with fingers. Lasts through day, face feels soft and hydrated (note I use an oil and moisturizer).

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - Light with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this. I “rediscovered” it after using Armani Luminous Silk & just wasn’t in love with that one. This looks so glowy, dewy and flawless. Used with a primer and setting spray, with finishing powder after. Highly recommend. I have combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is by far my favourite product to use as a foundation ! I always prefer tinted moisturizer over foundation because it gives that “no makeup” makeup look and I love that! It’s so gorgeous, it looks so healthy and it has enough coverage that it gives an even look to the skin without being heavy. Lasts all day, and is so worth the money!

My skin is shining with oil after about an hour. I can use a setting powder on top to prolong that time, but even then I get maybe 2-3 hours before I'm blotting with oil wipes. If you have oily skin, definitely pass on this. The search continues...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I use this I get compliments on my complexion! It’s light coverage but it covers my redness and looks so beautiful and dewy. It’s glowy and hasn’t clung to any dry patches I have. This is hands down my favorite tinted moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: Great everyday product, I am shook!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product.  I have combination skin & this offers light/medium coverage with a natural finish; a nice glow without looking oily.  Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TBH I never liked Smashbox products, but when I was in Sephora browsing for a new foundation, I tried this on a whim and was so impressed that I purchased it.   This outperforms all the other tinted moisturizers I've used, including IT Cosmetics and Bobbi Brown. The coverage is slightly more than sheer, perfect for running errands or the gym, or whenever you don't want to go full-on makeup but still want to look good. It provides the perfect amount of moisture and doesn't leave me greasy and needing to blot my forehead in an hour. It contains primer, so it's a good base if you do want more coverage. Just apply your usual foundation on top and it helps keep it fresh. It feels light and spreads easily and has no strong scent. Don't worry that glow means sparkly because it isn't. It just makes your skin look healthy. After using this for a couple months, I tried my IT Cosmetics CC cream, and it seemed thick and cakey compared to this. I'm a convert.

reviews.review_title: the best tinted moisturizer I’ve tried!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go to tinted moisturizer! Use it daily! Love that it doesn’t irritate the eye area like some sunscreens.

Super sensitive formula with good skincare ingredients, primer, spf and it actually gives you a little more coverage than a lot of tinted moisturizers but still looks super natural abs doesn’t feel heavy!!  So good!

reviews.review_title: The only tinted moisturizer I’ve ever loved
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never ever worn foundation because it’s too heavy for my oily skin That breaks out pretty much every time I try something new. I have previously tried Shiseido Tinted SPF moisturizer And that didn’t go over well. I tried this on a whim because I wanted some thing for the beach that gave a little coverage with SPF. The finish is very dewy but can be easily mattified with a setting powder. It provides just enough coverage for a natural look. I hope they come out with more shades because I agree some of them are orangey. The best part for me is it doesn’t break me out! I’m not sure how this is possible, maybe it’s the zinc? Who knows. Oh, and it makes all my other make up go on so much nicer. I’m guessing because of the primer element. I’ve never found primers very effective. Literally up until I use this, I always found my bronzer went on patchy and didn’t blend well. For some reason, my bronzer it looks flawless when I use this with a light dusting of setting powder over it. Clearly I’m in love with the stuff. It’s expensive for a tiny little bottle, but when you think about it, it illuminates the need for separate moisturizer, Primer. SPF, and in my case foundation. So happy with this product!

But, it sinks into my clean skin nicely and hardly sticks to dry patches. Overall, super impressed with this formula. I only wish they include more lighter colors. Because Fair is still a little too dark for me and has a more yellow undertone, and i would like a pink undertone.
