reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. I wanted a very light coverage that covers my dark circles and spots slightly but without it being caked. This works magic! Doesn't look like I'm wearing makeup, looks very natural but yet covers everything that I desire it to and it makes my skin GLOW. I love it 100% pick this up. Especially since it has spf so it's perfect for the summer!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally  do not use   this    I purchased for my daughter    who loves this product    she loves to look natural   and this does it for her      post note Ok so I spent 48   dollars on this   and for a promotion   I chose  the tatcha    for my promo     DIDNT GET IT   so I called  to enquire about this    the lady whom I will not name   was rude   put me on hold    didn't resolve anything    over a sample!!!!!!! All of a sudden I got the  tell us about your experience      what darn experience       ingot put on hold for 7 minutes with music so loud      nothing resolved

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love it. so natural looking like second skin perfected.

reviews.review_title: too shiny after a whole day :-(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo-oily skin. Some dry patches and a lot of texture.   Color match is great and it looks beautiful for the first few hours of wear. Feels really light and goes on well with beauty blender, brush, or hands. Halfway through my day I look SO oily I just can’t do it.   BUT, I have an irrationally high wishlist for my Face makeup. I want light to medium coverage, I want to feel nothing, I want a natural finish, and I want it to last all day without being matte, heavy, drying, etc., i also don’t want too much prep for a tinted moisturizer (no primer) and I don’t set my entire face, reapply throughout the day, or blot. I know, I’m impossible. So I know no product will have all the above.   This feels light and looks pretty for a while, but gets very oily throughout the day, moves and separates, and by the end of my day (which is usually 11 hours so again I’m being irrational), it’s completely gone.  But it does not cling to the mildly dry spots on my face and doesn’t accentuate texture too much (for a tinted moisturizer).   If you matte/long wear prep or set the whole face, or maybe if you don’t get super oily throughout the day, or don’t mind the VERY glowy (wet and oily) look, you will like this! Or if you are planning on wearing it for less than 11 hours at a time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! Have been on the search for the perfect tinted moisturizer for years. I’ve tried Nars, Laura Mercier, and a Makeup Forever that I loved but was discontinued. This one is my favorite. The finish is beautiful and it’s a great amount of coverage and very lightweight. Will be buying again!

reviews.review_title: Subtle glow works on combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a longtime user of Smashbox's Camera Ready BB Cream, and now that it's gone I've been in search of a replacement tinted moisturizer.  I was leery of this because glowy and dewy products are not what I typically use on my oily T-zone. But I was pleasantly surprised.  This product does manage to give a slight glow while keeping my skin matte throughout the day.  I don't love that I have to shake it, and I miss having spf 35 baked in, but on the whole this is still the best replacement for the old bb cream that I've found.

reviews.review_title: NEW HG SKIN TINT W/ SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff survives a full 8 hour work day, no excess oil, beautiful dewyness, and I LOVE the added SPF in conjunction with my other daily SPF for the added protection.  Matches my skin stone perfectly and the light coverage is so skin-like. I’m in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good tinted moisturizer. I like that it has spf. I have really dry skin (and live in Calgary), so it could be more moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Smashbox BB cream for at about 10 years. It was AMAZING! Now, they’ve discontinued that product and replaced/rebranded it with Halo. IT’S NOT THE SAME! Halo leaves my face dry and cakey. The BB Cream always stayed smooth and blended well. This stuff, not so much. Very disappointed!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Neutral - Light with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say I’m very impressed with this!  I have been looking for a tinted moisturizer for the summer months and at first didn’t want to try this because Smashbox complexion products and I don’t seem to get along, but I caved and bought this anyway. I’m so glad I did. It literally looks like skin while evening out my skin tone and even covering redness. The finish is dewy but not overly dewy like many others. It just looks natural.  And it lasts!  This is a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my new favorite foundation/tinted moisturizer.  My skin is on the oily side of the spectrum and I was a little concerned that this product would either break me out and/or make me look oily, but I saw all the rave reviews so I took a chance and was beyond pleasantly surprised by the end result.  I apply with a beauty blender and my skin looks so smooth and radiant when I’m finished.  I was also pleasantly surprised by the amount of coverage this gives me.  I was worried that it would be too shear but its actually more like a light-medium coverage foundation than a tinted moisturizer.  It covers minor imperfections and evens out my skin tone beautifully.  This is the only foundation that I’ve tried recently that doesn’t sink in to my pores and fine lines other than Armani Beauty Luminous Silk or power matte formulas but those two are so expensive.  For the price, this stuff is incredible.  And as long as I set it with a setting spray and use a good primer and setting powder, it lasts all day even under my mask.  It looks smoother and lasts much longer than all of the long wear formulas I’ve tried recently, (both Lancôme’s Taint Idol and Forever Matte and Bobbi Brown’s long wear formulas come off on my mask even if I use primer, powder, and setting spray.  And they accentuate my pores and fine lines).  This is my new holy grail.  I’m still going to try new formulas but I’m definitely going to be repurchasing; as long as the formula doesn’t change I’ll always have a bottle of this stuff on hand!  I’d give it more stars if I could!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: meh. I got this during the other-store-name-here sale when Sephora matches their prices. I was interested because I don't like heavy foundations and I am looking for an everyday lightweight tint with SPF.  My skin is not super sensitive, but it does have a fairly drastic type range, with my skin feeling anywhere from dry to dehydrated oily at anytime, and this moisturizer doesn't seem to suit any of my skin's moods.   At its best, it seems to sit on top of my skin, refusing to absorb or sink in, and at its worst, it makes my skin look flaky and leaves the skin underneath feeling dry. It doesn't always look like it's sitting on top - sometimes it looks pretty good! - but even when it look alright it feels like it will melt off my face with the first bead of sweat.   I've applied using my fingers, foundation brushes, and makeup sponges in every variety of dry / wet with water / wet with setting spray. A makeup sponge soaked with (NYX matte finish) setting spray was the most successful, but when I use it this way I'm not confident that I apply enough to get the benefit of the SPF, which was a large part of this product's appeal.    best part: smells vaguely like Play-Doh, which I actually like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love smashbox but I don’t love this particular product. Texture is a little too thick for my taste. I will finish it but will not buy again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - Light with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mad. Everyone has dry skin apparently. Bring back Smashbox Camera ready. Tired of dewy skin junk. Other woman have oily combination skin and these products are disgusting come an hr later for the amount of money and trial sizes to even try it on. Change the  spf if that was the problem since it was so bad for you. I literally never broke out from it having chemical sunscreen in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Needed new foundation for summer and after clearing up my skin big time I wanted less heavy coverage. This is amazing you don’t even need a sponge (but I prefer one) and it gives me the most amazing glow. It has a matte finish and pretty great coverage for redness and acne. No need for powder over it. I did notice once I put setting powder over it under eye area it got a bit blotchy but not really noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised by how well it covers & stays on the skin. I used to use Smashbox BB cream a couple of summers ago & loved that. When I saw that the new tinted moisturizer was on sale, I thought I would give it a try this summer. So happy I did. By itself it is so natural looking. I do use the Tarte airbrush mineral powder over it sometimes for more coverage & a more of a matte look. I don’t even have to use primer with it for it to stay on. Super pleased with this tinted moisturizer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am very disappointed with this product.  My Smashbox Camera Ready BB Cream is coming to an end so I went to Sephora and decided to try the replacement HALO It's no where close to the BB cream which Smashbox has discontinued.  The Halo is so runny it does not set on my face at all even when I tried it with various primers. Unfortunately I will be returning this product. This was a fail for Smashbox I wish they will bring back the bb cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this is the perfect summer formula. Light weight and light coverage to even my skin tone out that doesn’t settle into my fine lines. Gives me a healthy dewy look. If you don’t like the dewy look a light dusting of powder will fix it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like smashbox products but this is disappointing. I have been wearing tinted moisturizer for 30 years. I tried this one and noticed very sheer coverage and very shiny. You will need additional coverup and powder. Not really the point of using a tinted moisturizer when you have to add more to get the same affect as other tinted moisturizers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the texture and the natural finish, as well as the tone match, but this broke me out badly. I have sensitive, reactive, dry skin. I only wore it 3-4 times and had a seriously irritated/itchy/splotchy reaction on my chin and jawline that has taken several days of work to repair. This is a pass for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This slid right off my face about an hour after I put it on, and i have dry skin! It looked like it separated and it did not plan nice with my concealer. I returned it almost immediately after purchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a deluxe sample with my points and I have to say I’m quite surprised at what a natural glow it gave me. And barely any transfer to my face mask. I don’t even need a primer since its primer infused. If you need to touch it up just add more to the spots needed. For a tinted moisturizer I’m really impressed it didn’t irritate my really sensitive over reactive  skin. If you have pimples it doesn’t cover it but using some concealer in those spots works just fine. I like how light it is and feels like my skin. I just use my Mac prep and prime to finish it off and your good to go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great lightweight formula that goes on and looks natural. It doesnt really have a glow but it looks really nice. It lasted all day whether i set it or not. Since im kinda oily i was thinking id look like a grease ball at the end of the day without setting it and that the foundation would have cracked and moved around. Surprisingly it didnt. Yes i was a little more “glowy” but it still held up. Thats so hard to find in tinted moisturizers. When you apply this use your fingers or a brush and then whatever spots you cant blend down then pat with your sponge. Using just a sponge made it look splotchy. Im only deducting a star because their color range sucks and sadly the darker shades pull very orange!!! I went a shade lighter just so i didnt have the overwhelming orange color.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I don't wear foundation but wanted something to give me that color my face needed. This was perfect! I bought it to try because it was on sale. It's light and people didn't even know I had make up on. They thought it was a tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shade is a little too golden for me, but the coverage is sheer enough that I’m able to seamlessly blend it in to match the rest of my body. I do have some rosacea on my cheeks and this does a pretty good job in evening out my tone. The finish is very nice and glowy without looking greasy. I have pretty normal to combo skin and this held up great throughout the day. It didn’t cling to dry patches and it held up against the oily spots on my face.   I did use my Bare Minerals serum concealer with this just to cover some problem areas that needed a little extra coverage and I set it with my Hourglass translucent powder. Both products worked wonderfully with the tinted moisturizer and didn’t ruin the beautiful finish. I’m really amazed how wonderful my skin looks with this product. It looks like glass skin and I’m obsessed!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Matched my skin tone really well and like that it’s light weight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how smooth and soft the product feels. This tinted moisturizer covers my uneven, drier skin super well with a long lasting subtle natural glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a product like this for what seems like forever. This offers a glowy, sheer coverage that still looks like my skin, only better. This formula includes sunscreen which is great and is perfect for a more natural look. It wears really well through out the day and doesn't settle into lines or look cakey like foundation can. I still can't get over the light-from-within glow. I have an oily T-Zone so I do set it with powder on my nose but I always need to do that. When you are over 40, less is more with make-up and this is the perfect product to look fresh but natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. Shear full coverage for the with Neutral skin and can where anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I aboslity love this product. For my dry skin, it doesn't show you have it! Its super hydrating and glowy. If you do have acne scars though, I'd use two layers of this. But what I've found is this using this product you don't need a lot! I use a brush when applying and wow is it amazing. It is light to medium coverage (buildable) but it doesn't look cakey either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really striving to find a tinted moisturizer that matches with my skin tone, and I finally found it. I like my make up to look natural, so this is exactly what I was looking for. It hides all my small blemishes, and tiny bit of the dark circles under my eyes. It perfectly matches my Asian yellow undertone without being too orange or pink. Highly recommended. In my picture, I only have it on the left side of my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was nervous after seeing so many negative reviews but I was incredibly suprised. I am 43 with oily skin. I have an excellent skincare routine thanks to Skincare by Hyram and as a result just need something to help with my hyperpigmentation.  I believe people are applying it wrong and having poor results. I start with a clean moisturized face and add a little product to my cheeks, forhead, and chin.. I take the new elf complexion brush and simply buff it into my face and it disappears. I wear a mineral sunscreen underneath so the spf the Halo contains is just icing on the cake. I'm a light skin caucasian so I can't speak of how the other shades look on skin but fair light disappears into my light neutral skin. I've had so many compliments on my skin and it definitely achieves that no makeup look.  This is a cosmetic item so I wouldn't trust it to replace my daily moisturizer and without moisturized skin I can see how this might not spread easily or appy correctly.  If you're going to invest in expensive makeup please please start with a gentle skin routine and products developed for your skin. I've gone from trying to hide everything to now just using products that enhance my skin and let my skin breathe.  Thanks Smashbox..you did amazing with this particular formula and shade. I hope this helps, it looks so beautiful when applied properly.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tinted moisturizer did not work for me at all.  It breaks down on my face after a couple hours and my pores look much more prevalent.  Will not be buying again .

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was shade matched to Light Neutral, but they were sold out so I decided to try Fair. It was what seemed to be closest to my shade that was still in stock. Happy gamble! I thought it would be too light but it turned out to be the perfect shade for my fair, freckled skin.   I love that this is SPF 25. I wear directly it after cleansing, no primer since it claims to prime as well as moisturize. It really gives a very natural my skin but better finish. It definitely has better coverage than I was expecting for a tinted moisturizer, but I would still suggest using concealer for dark circles or zits. I deducted a star because it does feel a bit greasy on the face, and gets very shiny as the day wears on, even with setting powder or spray. Still, I got it for 50% off so I'mma keep it!

reviews.review_title: Try 2-3 times before making a decision
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so I was looking for something in between a tinted moisturizer and foundation (not as light coverage as a tinted moisturizer but not as makeupy as a foundation) and this definitely hit the target. I recommend trying it 2-3 different times with different ways of application (sponge, brush, hands etc.) because once I found what worked I was obsessed. It truly offers a healthy glow without transferring or looking greasy. It's long wearing which I needed. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because the smell upon first application is quite unpleasant but it does fade away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Its hard to believe this is only a tinted moisturizer with the coverage it gives. I bought it looking for something that evens out my skin tone and it does that 100%. Buildable in stubborn spots but its usually not even necessary. I'm only giving 4 stars because it does seem to rub off a bit where my mask touches by the end of the night, but overall I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Wear it everyday. Looks undetectable on the skin but still helps to even out my skin tone. I spot conceal with concealer for my blemishes and set lightly with powder. I love how hydrating it feels without looking greasy.

reviews.review_title: If I didn't get 1/2 off, I'd return...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't able to find a great shade match. I wear a light neutral in basically every foundation I wear. These shades, even the neutral ones, seem to have yellow undertones. The fair-light does have neutral undertones but is really light. The next shade up is very yellow and too dark for me. I can make them work but I don't want to have to work at it because I choose a tinted moisturizer because they're supposed to be easy. On top of that, it makes my pores look huge, it shows off every hair on my face, and just sits in top of my skin.  The odd thing is, it looks good from a distance...like really good...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works really well to even my skin tone and provides light coverage on my blemishes. It made my skin look pretty without looking like I am wearing foundation. I like wearing it to work, where I don’t want to look like I’m wearing too much makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is pretty nice and I will use it up. I found out quickly a little goes a very long way. It's a bit heavier at first, but I let it warm up on the back of my hand and it goes on very nice. It gives a very sheer, borderline light coverage. I didn't try and to build it up, but it takes away a bit of redness and discoloration without emphasizing or clinging to dry patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very disappointed with this purchase. To call this a tinted moisturizer is very misleading. I found this felt thick and heavy on my face. The shade match was horrible and this was very yellow. Maybe if it wasn't so tacky it would have blended better. I will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No, no, no. I got this because the sales associate at Sephora recommended it, since smash box discontinued the bb cream. Smash box, bring it back!!!  This is night and day difference from the bb cream and made my skin super dry. The sunscreen isn’t mineral, and the color is super orange. It settled right into my creases and did not wear well even for the few hours I had it on. I already returned it and got Ilia tinted moisturizer which is MUCH better and very close to the smash box bb!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This got returned. I was looking for a light, tinted moisturizer with sunscreen I could put on after the gym. What this is, is a thick foundation like formula, not easy to put on and not moisturizing. Def. would need a beauty blender with this. Also, the Light medium was Orange. I mean orange. I have olive skin and this looked terrible on my skin. Back it goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a devoted Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer user for a decade. This, however, has changed since they changed the coloring with their last package update. I was recommended this Halo product and I am in complete love. It absorbs like a moisturizer with an amazing dewy glow. I can see that it may not be good for oily skin, but this is absolutely perfect for that effortless sheer & moisturized look. In love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very thick and just sits on my skin. It does not absorb at all. Other people may have different experiences but this one doesn’t work for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I've been looking for in a tinted sunscreen! It provides a fair amount of coverage and evens out my skin tone which is perfect for the summer when I don't want to use foundation. It's nice and buildable and blends right into my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely wear regular foundation anymore, cuz what's the point during a pandemic and I'm working from home. But I still want a little something for those Zoom meetings. This is the best tinted moisturizer I've ever used! It has a sheer coverage but enough to even out my skin for a healthy glow. I use my fingers and apply to my face and it blends really well. It's lightweight and I like that it doesn't sit on my face like other tinted moisturizers and I can feel its hydrating effects. I use Makeup Forever Ultra HD Microfinishing Pressed Powder to set it and it lasts all day. Minimal rub off when wearing my mask too. I really like this and SPF 25 is a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this but didn't quite hit the mark for me. I have been using the MAC face and body foundation for years and wanted something lighter coverage with SPF that will make me glow! My skin is sensitive to most sunscreens and until now I have been using a spray face sunscreen as creams were always a problem and caused my cheeks to burn. Was very happy the SPF in this did not cause any reaction, however I find it kind of difficult to apply and get even coverage using my foundation brush. I am fair but I found the color did change throughout the day to a more orange tone, nothing drastic or clowny but noticeable to me. I think this would work well if you are tan or have a darker skin tone. I also found my skin drying out after I added this to my routine even with a moisturizer applied underneath, which definitely didn't help me glow. I want to find a way to get the results I know many others have so will continue to try and make this work, might be my skin type. However, I have since tried the First Aid beauty tinted moisturizer and Smashbox is WAY better!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice feel on the skin, it’s buildable but I like it sheer. Gives a healthy skin look. It does not break me out, which says a lot considering I have acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this tinted moisturizer! Doesn’t settle into any creases, the perfect amount of coverage, color is off slightly (I’m usually a light to warm golden shade and the shade Light was a perf match) I normally wear shade 1.2 in the studio skin foundation for reference

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It isn't as good as the BB cream imo - doesn't go on as smoothly or hydrate the skin as well. I like that there are different shades available. Also doesn't cause breakouts for me so far which is a plus. I find the coverage is less than the BB cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bring back the smashbox BB cream! I was told it was replaced with this, but it is not the same. Does not hydrate my skin like BB cream and the color comes across orange. I won't be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchase the Medium Tan and it’s perfect; it’s the perfect tinted moisturizer and didn’t oxidize and turn orange after wearing it for hours - A+ in my book!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this. Really gives a natural glow and makes skin look hydrated. When I apply this it looks great but up close it is awful. It does not blend nicely to the skin and just has a bad texture. I’ve tried applying it with my hands and beauty blender. I enjoy light coverage and this was a great light coverage tinted moisturizer. Going to give it just a few more tries. Personally, there is better out there for a fraction of the price.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good product ! I love it ! I have sensitive skin and I’m prone to breakouts but this tinted moisturizer doesn’t break me out . The spf is a plus .

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Neutral - Light with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's Okay.  I wanted to try another product less costly. This is really light and not enough coverage to my expectation. It does have SPF and a little glow since it's tinted so it's okay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the absolute best tinted moisturizer! Please don’t ever stop making it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is honestly the best. It keeps my skin protected while also covering some of my acne scaring. I have not broken out from using it and I love the glow it gives my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this as I love most Smashbox products, but this oxidized SO badly. At least 5 shades darker than it's supposed to be, with strong orange undertones. It's a shame as the formulas feels great and looks amazing as you apply it, but 10 minutes later you look like a carrot.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Out of all the tinted moisturizers I’ve tried this one is the best. I have found that this gives sheer coverage when applied with your hands and light coverage when applied with a beauty blender. I always use a sponge and spot concealing is very minimal. It gives a very skin-like finish and is perfect for anyone that does not like the heaviness of foundation but still wants a little coverage. This is initially very dewy and you will feel it on your face but it does set down slightly on its own. It has a slight sunscreen scent but it is not off-putting. I have dry skin and always set with a setting spray for extra longevity. I get a good 6 hrs of wear before things start to break down. Unfortunately the fair shades are too pink for my olive skin tone. Thankfully it is light enough coverage that it is not overly noticeable but I would prefer that it matches my neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My 411:  45 yrs old, fair-fair light, normal to dry skin (dry in winter), mild rosacea, some texture, crows feet (I’m one expressive lady)!  I am shocked!! Smashbox is underrated and this product is light weight, oxidizes to my skin tone - I honestly thought light would be too dark, it’s perfect. It’s hydrating, my skin looks blurred (unless it’s my eyesight!), and my face look even. I don’t wear blush or bronzer - this, mascara, and gloss (Patrick Ta or Fenty).This is my no makeup makeup look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh. My. Goodness. This is the product I’ve been needing in my life. I have combo skin (oily t-zone, dry everywhere else) and this sits flawlessly on my skin. Perfect for those days where i just need light coverage to even out my complexion. Lightweight and blends perfectly with a beauty blender, mixed with normal moisturizer, or with your hands as is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It definitely turned my skin slightly orange. I use the tinted moisturizer from Charlotte Tilbury and that one doesn't leave any sort of orange cast!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is sooo good! Rubbed it in like lotion on my face so quick and easy to get a healthy glow when I don’t wanna do a full face. My skin has been looking bleh on it’s own so this is perfect for everyday use to give my face that extra coverage when needed. Highly recommend. It does run a little dark. I’m usually a medium/tan and I went with light neutral on this.

reviews.review_title: GIRL GET IT! ESPECIALLY MY MELANIN QUEENS.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great. Legit, I love it. I didn’t even know it existed tbh. I came into Sephora looking for something with light, but decent coverage that wouldn’t take away from my skin so I figured a light-medium coverage foundation would do . I rarely go for tinted moisturizers as some give literally no coverage and the colors tend to get a little weird or nonexistent once it gets darker on the spectrum(story of my life), but she showed me this one and raved about it so I figured I’d give it a try and just bring it back. NOPE. I LOVE it. Such beautiful coverage and it gives your skin that glow that you get once you do all your skincare and your skin is all plump and healthy looking, this does that on its own! I use it everyday when I just want to look evened out and put together and it looks flawless, healthy, and the color is a beautiful match. They even have shades darker than mine!! Great job smashbox. Your skin but better is such an understatement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this product. It makes my skin look so dewy and healthy. I'm a skincare junky and have been struggling with dry skin due to tretinoin use and this does not feel drying or irritating to my sensitive skin. This is not for yiu if you want t full or even medium coverage foundation. This will just even out your skintone and create a lit from within glow, but won't hide any acne marks or hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Made my face a little too dry. And foundation started breaking. Not sure if it’s just the weather but definitely not working for my skin at the moment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Buildable coverage perfect for these dry winter months. A little dewy at first but once it dries it makes my skin look flawless

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love but made me breakout
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this after seeing a few of my fav bloggers rave about it but unfortunately this wasn’t for me. I really wanted to love it but for some reason it made me break out like crazy on my forehead every time I tried to wear it - I’d still give it a shot if you’re looking for a dewy tinted moisture, unique texture and good coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product I had never wanted to use a foundation so this product was perfect it was easy to apply I use a sponge or just use my fingers to apply it blends perfectly and set great with  simple setting spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was just ok. The shade range is limited and they don’t really offer a shade for more olive toned skin. The texture of this is weird. It dries down quickly and doesn’t spread out evenly across the face with brush, fingers, or sponge. I will definitely stick to my bare minerals complexion rescue over this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Neutral - Light with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly so far I love it. I’ve only worn it twice so far but I have super sensitive skin and it hasn’t irritated it. It has a beautiful subtle glow with light coverage just how I like it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been using the other Smashbox tinted moisturizer that got discontinued (it was my go-to, repurchased probably five times) and was wary of trying something new, but I'm happy to say I love it. It feels like it has ever so slightly more coverage and feels more hydrating. Definitely recommend if you want to even out skin tone without fully covering. It helps balance out my naturally pink cheeks. I have combo skin and do feel like I need to use a pore strip or oil balancing mask on my oilier areas after wearing this for days in a row, but that's true for every tinted moisturizer or foundation I've used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favourite , i love the amount of coverage this gives me , I use a beauty blender to apply and then follow with a little concealer under eye and cream blush . Leaves me looking fresh ! If you have a slightly more oily complexion just add a little setting powder in those areas and you’ll be good to go!

reviews.review_title: Great tinted moisturizer for a brilliant glow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It goes on so silky smooth and leaves your skin with an amazing glow! I wouldn't hesitate to buy again, but next time I would go in-store to make my purchase because I don't feel like the shade I selected online was an exact match and would rather see the product in-person next time.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t love this.  I’m in my 40s, but don’t have a lot of wrinkles.  In the winter my skin can be drier but I have a good skin care routine.  I usually wear CT and Dior but used my points for a sample of this because I love SB lipsticks and primers.  It settled into my fine lines in a way my other foundations don’t.  I tried it with primer and without with no luck.  Sounds like other people are loving it, so maybe it is just my face it doesn’t work for lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT! As someone who struggles with adult acne, and has very sensitive skin, this is the perfect combo. Just the right amount of coverage, with SPF, and   color. If you suffer from acne and are sensitive to SPF clogging your pores and breaking you out, this doesn’t do that. It gives you such a beautiful glow with coverage and protection. Doesn’t make me oily, and it barely oxidizes. I have normal to oily skin :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a tinted moisturizer for days I don’t feel like doing a full face makeup look and I have finally found THE ONE! I have red undertones in my skin that bothers me and this product has helped me fixed that! It has enough coverage to help cover that but light enough that it feels like I am not wearing makeup! Also a plus that it doesn’t really transfer it dried down really nicely on my combination skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for dewy skin I promise this is it !!! It was light weight and gives the right amount of light coverage ! I really really like this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I minimized my makeup collection a few years ago I threw out all my foundation and stuck to just concealer, but I now find that I miss the light bit of coverage and tint. I've been searching for the perfect tinted moisturizer for years-- one with spf, goes on natural-looking, and keeps my skin moisturized and glowy (on top of another moisturizer). It blends amazing with my fingers (don't recommend a brush!) and makes my face look so healthy and glowy and NATURAL. I do set it lightly with a glow setting powder (the elf one) and it stays on very well! You do need to set it, but if you use a glowier powder it'll keep the glowy effect until it settles in. Still looks very natural!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m pretty back and forth on this product - for one thing, it’s too dark for my fall/winter skin, but I can make it work. It feels very thick but does not feel thick on the skin, and applies really well with your fingers or with a sponge. The level of coverage is really good for a tinted moisturizer and I love that it has SPF. But it can oxidize like crazy and you need to set it with lots of powder and setting spray for it to last. Which, if you have oily skin, isn’t a problem, but I was dried out after a few hours and had to wash it off. I think I’ll save it for the summer, where I can get away with a little more powder thanks to the heat. I’m not sure if I’ll repurchase - I have some other tinted moisturizers to use up.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Neutral - Light with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definately a nice product but I was expecting more of a tint with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not your typical light coverage tinted moisturizer! This has a good medium coverage and beautiful natural glowy finish. You don’t need a lot of product to achieve this look and it should last you a long time. I haven’t been breaking out either, so this might me a perfect option for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer forever, but I was given Halo as a sample and immediately got the full size. It spreads easily, but has much better coverage than the Laura Mercier moisturizer. This still gives the natural look of a tinted moisturizer, but the consistency and overall finish smooths out skin better.

reviews.review_title: Product comes off face after 2 hours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Came off my face within 2 hours. Wanted to love it but it was horrible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for everyday when you don’t want to fuss . Gives just enough coverage for those days when you just want to  throw some sunscreen on , look good and get out the door . Not heavy and just enough glow .

reviews.review_title: Big Like: It does exactly what it promises!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: ...and I like this tinted moisturizer. It provides exactly what it promises: tint and moisture. I am happy with the color. It exactly matches my skin, it also has SPF 25. It's creamy and provides natural coverage. I have a dry skin and this moisturizer does its job with healthy glow. I am happy with this product and will be buying more for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping to love this since I love the no makeup makeup up look but I didn’t. Felt kind of heavy on the skin and about an hour of wearing it I could feel my oils just building up. If you have combination skin that’s acne prone like I do this might not be for you. Plus side us it has a very nice glow.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this product. With having to wear a mask all day long at work, I was looking for a tinted moisturizer instead of my usual foundation, and I am converted. It matches my very pale skin well, has a bit of a glowy finish that I usually set with powder, and has SPF. Doesn’t transfer much onto a mask either which is nice

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this, it does exactly what describes. Light coverage , add concealer if you need more. Quick application, and a glowy finish. I use setting powered after because I personally don’t like my skin super glowy in some areas. But love the spf and light coverage for quick days

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: whether its applied with brush or sponge it does not blend well into the skin. It does apply better with fingers, but that is not my preferred way of applying base makeup. Does not last and leaves skin very oily

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mix the medium tan in with your daily foundation!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received complimentary for review purposes and I did not like this at all... accentuated my dry skin and only lasted an hour even when setting. Transfers so easy and barely covers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend if you are looking for a sheer, natural finish, long wear tinted moisturizer. It feels great, and wears well, especially in terms of lack of transfer to the inside of a mask

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate and love this product. I like the coverage, however it transferred pretty quickly and left my skin oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't hated a product this much in a long time. It was impossible to blend, looked smeary on my skin and way too shiny and greasy. It was more like wearing sunscreen - not nice face sunscreen either more like the stuff you get at the drugstore! And I would say coverage is VERY light not light medium

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! Super lightweight while has amazing coverage effects! Moisturized my skin at the same time so that’s always a plus. Price point is super nice as well. Definitely will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Lightweight but didn’t blow me away.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight but not didn’t love it. Maybe I didn’t color match well but I got an unflattering shine while using. I think perhaps the golden undertones gave the appearance of a shimmer which I didn’t like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I didn’t think i was going to like it but it’s become my favorite. It keeps the skin looking good while blurring blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shade was dark for me but overall love the feel and the SPF.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a religious user of Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer and tried this through a campaign. I was pleasantly surprised. Coverage is light-medium and buildable. The color was a little too light for me, however, and it seemed to cake up in certain parts of my face

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice tinted moisturizer. It has decent coverage, meaning it actually evens out the constant redness of my cheeks. The finish is lovely - radiant without looking greasy and lasts all day in my dry/combo skin. It includes some nice skin-beneficial ingredients as well. My few gripes: the amount of dimethicone clogged my pores pretty significantly and the chemical spf irritated some rosacea patches on my cheeks. Might not be the best choice for the very sensitive, but all in all is a solid choice that will leave you glowing.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Dark Neutral - Dark with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for a no make up look. Goes on well. Still prime & set then going about your day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation will transfer onto your things and leaves a stain. No matter how much you set it, it will come off...as a person using darker foundation that’s not a cute look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging and the amount of product you get. It's a thick consistency which I prefer, but was dumbfounded that being a thicker consistency, the coverage was still pretty light/sheer. I was able to build it up, but than it would start to look cakey and gross..  By the time I had put it on and by the time I had taken it off; was only 4 hours.. there was hardly a trace of makeup on my cotton pad.. Not long wearing :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really don’t get the hype about this product. First, it’s EXTREMELY thick. Total misnomer to call it a moisturizer— it definitely felt like a heavy foundation. Second, the colour range is bizarre. I’m an NC35 for reference and the shade medium was a good 2 shades too dark and EXTREMELY orange. Say what?! Just no. Glad I got this as a sample and didn’t pay for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the natural glow this product gives! It has a light coverage, but definitely reduces the redness from my acne. Not the strongest moisturizer as I still had some dry spots on my skin, but that was expected. As someone who is struggling with acne, this is the first tinted moisturizer I used that did not break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I am super picky with foundation and only wear Charlotte T but not any more.  I got a deluxe sample.  I assumed when I read tinted moisturizer that there would be no coverage, but, wow was I wrong.  It covers spots beautifully, while looking quite natural! Will order the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recommended by a Sephora employee. So beautiful! Great coverage for a tinted moisturizer. I love this! My new everyday product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product I received it complimentary by Influenster, I’m not someone who usually gravitates toward products that are considered tinted moisturizer because I never felt like they were any different then just sheer foundation but I really enjoyed the skin care ingredients in this one and that it had SPF you can wear it sheer or build it up and it’s not to high in price either

reviews.review_title: Moisture + SPF + Even Coverage Light Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth, even coverage. This is a lighter formula that didn’t make my face look cakey. Great for daily use! It replaced three other products in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved it! Good enough coverage to cover my hyperpigmentation but still looks like skin. It’s definitely on the dewy side so I always set it. Can’t wait to try it in the winter time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this product! I love that it is cruelty free and oil free! It lasts pretty much all day and has a lovely finish! Would buy again and recommend!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is good, just not great for me! It was a little dry after a while on my already dry skin. I would still give this a chance, it has nice coverage for a tinted moisturizer and sunscreen which is always a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always had a difficult time with tinted moisturizers. I hadn’t used one in quite some time, so I was excited when I received a sample of Halo Healthy Glow Tinted Moisturizer. Needless to say, I will continue to avoid to Ted moisturizers. No matter how I applied the product, it felt sticky and heavy. It didn’t blend very well and seems to sit on my face. I had to set it to even feel “normal.” It settled into my pores and fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am actually in love with this product! Using a tinted moisturizer was never something I considered for my makeup routine. Over time I have grown to love a more natural look everyday. When I tried this product I loved it. At first I was afraid it would make me look orange, but I was shocked how well it blended into my skin. The texture is smooth and moisturizing and can be easily applied. I also love how long lasting and natural it looks. This is definitely going to become part of my staple makeup routine.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - Tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Flawless. I actually use this as my primer. I now use less foundation and the glow is so beautiful.  This is a keeper.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - Medium with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This goes on very thick, so there is no way the result could be a healthy glow, more of an orange slick....because it sits on top of the skin and the color is really off! I have medium olive skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is very lightweight and for a tinted moisturizer, it has decent coverage. The only downfall was the shade I got was a little too light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but listen to me when I tell you, this stuff is amazing! It literally melts into your skin. It’s such a flawless dewy look, I did my makeup about 6 hours ago and it’s still fresh! This is perfect for girls who want a airbrush look, Ive never had a color match this perfect. Put it in your cart, you won’t be disappointed!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - Medium with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product. It’s perfect if you want to even out your skin tone, but don’t want to apply foundation. Also, it has SPF! Perfect if you’re not a multistep skincare person like myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this leaves your face glowing. I used mine as a bronzer. I received this product complimentary for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for review purposes. I genuinely love this product so much. It’s perfect for a lighter when I don’t want to use my medium-full coverage makeup. It’s survived the mask test time and time again. It’s given me really nice coverage compared to some other tinted moisturizers. I love that I can get a little color added to my face in the morning when I look sickly, without covering the natural marks on my face. You don’t need a lot of product to get a nice level of coverage so I can see this product lasting a while for me. I will definitely be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great tinted moisturizer! One of the better ones I have tried in the last few years. It really makes my skin GLOW as the name suggests. I receive compliments on my skin any time I wear it. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - Light with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a solid meh. It should not be advertised as a tinted moisturizer. It is a medium coverage foundation at best. It left my skin feeling cakey with blotches of pigment that couldn't be fully blended.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Dark - Tan with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful formula! Really like this tinted moisturizer, color match is spot on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product. The spf is very helpful. I don’t use sunscreen by itself but I liked that it was put into a moisturizer. It was very light weight. I would’ve liked for it to last longer than 12 hours but either way it leaves a nice natural glow. If I want a natural finish but matte look I can always add a setting powder and get the look. This product was complementary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! So hydrating and the coverage is amazing. Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for review purposes. I genuinely love this product so much. It’s perfect for a lighter when I don’t want to use my medium-full coverage makeup. It’s survived the mask test time and time again. It’s given me really nice coverage compared to some other tinted moisturizers. I love that I can get a little color added to my face in the morning when I look sickly, without covering the natural marks on my face. You don’t need a lot of product to get a nice level of coverage so I can see this product lasting a while for me. I will definitely be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great tinted moisturizer! One of the better ones I have tried in the last few years. It really makes my skin GLOW as the name suggests. I receive compliments on my skin any time I wear it. Definitely recommend.
