reviews.review_text: This color didn’t exactly match my skin tone, which was very disappointing. It was super lightweight and didn’t seem to dry my skin out at all. I love that it has SPF! It blended well, even though it did not match my skin tone exactly (I used it mainly to test out the product). It didn’t crease either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This as a great tinted moisturizer. I love having a a light weight foundation. I do not like a lot of coverage and have a hard time finding foundations that don't make me look cakey. This applied smoothly and I love that it has SPF. I received this product for free for a review through influenster. I am happy to have this in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not happy with this one. The girl at sephora helped me and I still think its too yellow. The consistency I dont like either I have to mix it with my sunscreen so it glides on my skin. I'm definitely not happy with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! I am not a fan of tinted moisturizers because I like a more fuller coverage but this is honestly one of the best ones I’ve tried. Such nice coverage and the finish is really nice and I also love that it has spf!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product for light daily coverage. It pretty much covers all the bases except that the texture is quite thick and doesn’t spread super easily. It’s more medium coverage and was a little heavier than expected. I don’t typically have dry skin, but I found on the first application it clung to small patches of dry skin on my nose and wasn’t super moisturizing. I did however like the colour matching and various colours, as well as the SPF!

reviews.review_title: Close to L. Mercier’s original tinted moisturizer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you, like me, miss the original Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer formula — which was so perfect in every way, you must try Smashbox’s Halo Healthy Glow Tinted Moisturizer! The texture, coverage, and lasting power are the same. Even the tube is very similar. The people at Smashbox are geniuses, I’m convinced; so many consumers miss the original Laura Mercier formula very much, so launching Halo Heathh Glow out on the market right now is so smart.   For preference, my skin tone is MAC NC20/Sephora Pantone Y107/NARS Santa Fe/Light Vanilla/Light Buff, and the shade “Light Medium” fit my skin seamlessly.   The coverage is so gorgeous — the coverage is enough to make the best of your skin (I look a good ten years younger when wearing this!), but your skin will still look like skin. In the Summer, I’m very greasy, dry in the Winter, and just plain insane in the Fall and Spring, and Smashbox’s Halo Healthy is a formula that should work for the majority of the population. The lasting power is excellent — I get 12 hours of wear from this before it begins to fade, but still looks fabulous.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product that evens out my skin appearance like I was hoping. Also a plus that it has SPF!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives me a nice glow with coverage. It is medium coverage but that’s what I prefer right now. Love that it’s a moisturizer and has spf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so impressed with this product, thank you Influenster! With three whole pandemic a full face isn't anyways ideal but this tinted moisturizer provided the natural coverage I usually prefer. I applied it over a silicone based primer and with a beauty blender. The color matched beautifully and I love the natural glow it created. Thanks xx

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - Medium with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin was glowing and it felt lightweight but oily. My skin is already oily so I really don’t need much on.  It did help even my skin tone but this is not full coverage. I wouldn’t just wear this by itself. I would definitely build it up. The primer infused formula is genius!  No need to put primer which is great! I did look like I had no makeup as it makes you look as natural as you can which is a plus. I loved that it was a tinted moisturizer with SPF as it has it all. I am only giving it a 3 star because it doesn’t work on my skin. My skin is oily already and this just makes it more oily. It is not a good feeling on my face after 2 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this product. It is a one stop shop for moisturizer, sunscreen, and good coverage. It goes on so nicely, and the coverage lasts all day. This will be a new staple in my makeup drawer for sure!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: . It gives sheer to medium coverage with the glow that you’re looking for. It’s buildable and works well when used with other cream products. I wore distancing moisturizer with concealer cream bronzer and blush and some setting powder. It gave a great finish. My only concern, is that it can make you look way too oily if you have combination skin like myself or oily skin.I would definitely recommend to anyone Who has dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend said I looked like a glowing goddess when I had this one with no other makeup and my hair down and wavy. He had no idea it was the first time I was wearing this tinted moisturizer and that that was the secret! I bought this to wear on a trip to high humidity Florida, and despite my propensity to sweat a lot, this stayed on all day. I’m obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this free through Influenster. I am usually a matte face kind of girl. I admit I was scared at first. When I first put it on,  I looked greasy.  It got better as it dried. I was  surprised that it didn't have a strong suntan lotion smell. I will use it again! Applied with brush.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Dark Neutral - Dark with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE! It’s lightweight, so it feels like I have nothing on, but gives me a “your skin but better” look. My favorite part is that it’s a physical sunscreen without a white cast! I just wish the SPF were at least 30, but this is still beautiful.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tinted moisturizer! It’s more coverage than The other ones that I’ve used, but less than a foundation. It brightens the skin, and gives a natural, dewy finish. I do have to powder it to get it to last, but that’s pretty much every face product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Natural dewy finish. Minimal light coverage. If you have dry skin you may need a moisturizer under it. I received this complimentary from influenster

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - Medium with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Big fan of this! It went on very light and was easy to blend in. My mom was able to use it too and she hates putting on makeup and said it was so easy for her :) It gives a vary natural look so definitely not full coverage but it was nice. Needed powder to set it but if you don’t have super oily skin then you probably don’t need that much. Love that it has sunscreen in it as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been looking for a good tinted moisturizer that can be used for an everyday look and I’m in love. I received a an opportunity to try tit out from Influenster and this I’m in love. I have super dry skin so this is amazing for me and I don’t feel sticky or cakey.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So so impressed! I love this tinted moisturizer and it has become one of my go to’s when applying makeup. It is soft but matte and definitely glowing. Will be purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this tinted moisturizer and I’m typically a full-coverage foundation type of girl. The healthy glow this gives me is so fabulous. This is perfect for “no makeup” makeup. I paired this with concealer so I may have cheated about but it looks as perfect for a little quick 10 minutes look. I recommend this for those with don’t struggle with with dark spots or aren’t looking for a ton of coverage but still want color and the appearance of healthy skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, but don’t know if I love it yet! Worn 4-5 times so far and like it, but found it to oxidize..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this for everyday wear! So great to wear alone or under foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay, but not the best. It leaves a sticky feel to my face and is not mask friendly. It helped tone down my redness but did nothing to conceal my “mascne”, although it is marketed as a light coverage so that’s understandable. I uploaded photos, red is before neutralized is after.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tinted moisturizer works great for that no make-up, makeup look. It gave a lot of hydration for my dry skin and also had a good amount of coverage without feeling too heavy. I also noticed I didn’t have to use primer with it because it didn’t break down through out the day. This is a great makeup product for those days you want to put something on and go without feeling like a cake face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has almost replaced my foundation! I love this light texture that feels like nothing is even on my face. I pair this with a little concealer and that’s been my routine since purchasing! This formula has a nice coverage but does not feel heavy on the skin. I highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Dark - Tan with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so happy that I received this Glow Tinted Moisturizer for free because I am in love with it. This is perfect for those days, you don’t want to have a full beat face on. It doesn’t feel heavy at all on the face, the shade matched perfect with my skin complexion and I’ve been using it nonstop! This is a must buy product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying, I don’t typically wear any type of liquid foundation. I rarely wear makeup at all, but this product is amazing! It goes on smoothly & easily and blends perfectly with my skin. This is my first time using a tinted lotion type of foundation and I am not disappointed!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - Tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the wrong shade so it’s hard for me to accurately judge, but from what I saw it does the job. It’s not too buildable but if you like a sheer look then it’s great. You can also use it as a base for a foundation, and I liked it that way best. The shade tan was too red for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Medium shade & I love it! It looks so natural and blurs lines and bumps on my face! This is such a great full coverage moisturizer and I don’t have to worry about putting on a full face to feel like I look glamorous

reviews.review_title: Okay but not great for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Using it evens out my skin tone with medium coverage for a more natural look but I did find it a bit heavier than expected. I appreciate that it has SPF 25 for sun protection, though I still recommend applying sunscreen! From my the various times I used it, it mostly worked well on my skin with a tad bit of highlighter but on it’s own it left me looking a bit ashy and pale instead of the glow I was expecting. I think it’s because I have super dry skin and this product seems formulated more for normal to oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really enjoying this tinted moisturizer because I have normal to dry skin with uneven skin tone and it gives me a fresh glowy look and evens out my skin. It doesn't offer much coverage but that doesn't bother me because I spot correct with my concealer anyways and that way my skin feels super light and breathable without a heavy foundation all over. The SPF is an added bonus! I would recommend this tinted moisturizer for anyone who is looking for sheer coverage and hydration! My skin will be loving this in the winter months to come especially!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - Fair with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best tinted moisturizer that I’ve ever used, but it gives a nice light coverage and I like that it has spf in it! I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free from Influenster. It wasn’t love. I tried it as a primer first and it was okay. The color wasn’t perfect. A little too orange. Not much coverage and I feel like it didn’t last. I don’t think I would purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is between a moisturizer and a foundation, so it’s not easy to apply like a moisturizer but if you use a sponge, it goes on nicely and it is blendable. I would absolutely buy it again because it feels good on my skin and the color is blendable, but wouldn’t get it with an expectation that it’s something you can put on quickly like a moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Much thicker than I was expecting more line foundation which I don’t like for the sumner.. heavy and sticky tacky and oooooohhhhh so luminous.. hard pass for me ..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for testing purposes. I really enjoy the easy application, and how flawless, but natural my skin looked. This is perfect for everyday makeup application. I love this for everyday use. I would recommend this for any skin type. T

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - Fair-light with a cool undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this tinted moisturizer! For a tinted moisturizer, the formula is thicker than I expected it to be. I like it best when I apply it to my face with my finger but then blend it in with a beauty sponge. I tried applying with a brush and it didn’t blend into the skin well and felt thick on the face. For a tinted moisturizer, I think this gives really nice coverage. I build it up a little on my cheeks because of my rosacea. I highly recommend it - I will definitely be purchasing it once I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Originally got this in light neutral and it was way to red. I had to go with light for my olive skin tone. Kind of makes my face look oily. I have normal/dry skin. Not sure if I love it or hate it yet. It has decent coverage. Will update after trying it for awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s the perfect type of product for me. I love how sheer and build-able the coverage is. I makes my skin look amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had no idea how I would feel  when I got this Tinted Moisturizer to try with influenster but my oh goodness am I impressed! The coverage is great and it literally makes my skin glow! Its very versatile because you can use it alone or layer with a foundation for more coverage so it goes day to night seamlessly. I have oily combination skin and have no issues with it either. I love this :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m normally a full coverage foundation type of girl. But this stuff is AMAZING! It’s super light weight and blends very easily, but it does a perfect job at Evening out my skin tone. It covers blemishes and it stays on all day. Best part is it doesn’t look cakey at all ! Ever since I got it I haven’t touched my Becca or tarte foundations because I love how natural this looks on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this as I love multi-tasking skin products which make skin look like skin. I think it’s a great formula - it’s has skin loving ingredients - moisturizer, primer and it’s tinted . I compared it to two of my favorite tinted moisturizers/bb cream . 1)Laura mercier- halo is more tinted in comparison but is also more matte. It doesn’t give a dewy finish for me initially. I found my skin became oily after 1 hour of application.  2) IT cosmetics - I know halo is a tinted moisturizer but it is pretty pigmented hence worth the comparison. Halo sits on the skin more easily and needs less blending . But I am not a fan of the finish and I prefer IT.  The color I received was a shade darker than my skin color - so my experience could have been affected by that. Overall I love the formulation but I am not a fan of the finish.The shade range is a little off .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this. I was debating between the rare beauty foundation and this, and I’m so glad I chose this. I’m barely a makeup wearer as it is but with so many zoom calls I wanted to look a little more alive with little to no effort. And OMG, this delivers. It’s so easy to apply, so light weight and seriously I instantly look alive fresh faced!!! It evens out my skin tone, hides minor imperfections and gives me a healthy glow. For someone who does not like putting makeup on, this is the perfect solution!!! Seriously get it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best foundations I have ever used. Made my  skin flawless. Wore it under my mask, and didn’t ruin it at all. I would recommend this to everyone. Very lightweight and feels like nothing is on. Medium coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster to try out. I absolutely love it! I don't like heavy foundations, so this light coverage is perfect for me. It feels velvety on the skin and sinks in very quickly, leaving my face feel like I'm not wearing anything. The finish is natural and it doesn't sweat off. I will definitely continue using when I need a bit of coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product was a good concept. Maybe it was my fault. Influenster sent me the wrong shade color and the product made my skin very dry.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - Light with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! My face looks flawless. I did have to apply it quickly with my fingers rather than a brush or blender but it’s coverage is great die a tinted moisturizer and my skin looks fresh and clean.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the product. I have a hard time finding tinted moisturizers that I like but this one is not too heavy. A little bit seems to go a long way. I definitely recommend it to my friends. Well worth it. The coverage is great for what I want -- not too cakey and very natural.

reviews.review_text: Totally Obsessed with thisss! Skin just super youthful, fresh, plum. My favorite thing over the summer. Feels like skin. Had to take off a star because I usually apply bb cream or foundation w/ a blender but with this I couldn’t. It have me no coverage. A brush application is the way to go with this one.!

reviews.review_text: I LOVE SPF products and mix this in with my daily moisturizer with SPF. This does NOT sting your eye, doesn’t leave greasy feeling and is a great addition to daily skincare routines. I’d recommend for you to give this a try!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product was very smooth and light weight. I didn’t get the correct shade but would definitely purchase again in correct shade. Buildable coverage and moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been using Kosas tinted oil and thought I’d found the holy grail...but this may have taken its place. Although they  both feel light on and help retain moisture in the skin (I’m dry) I love the glow and light coverage of the Halo Healthy Glow. It really came through when I used it the next morning after drinking. Most foundations look bad on hungover skin and I’d like to not have another reminder of my poor choices. The only thing worse than my next-day shame, is having my makeup settle into my pores and highlight the few tiny fine lines that only appear when my skin is possibly more dehydrated than I am. So I couldn’t believe that this not only made me look alive, it actually made me look GOOD!    For the sake of transparency, I got this free in exchange for my review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very sheer/light coverage, however,  with concealer and powder on top, it STILL looks like skin! No pores, super smooth! I love how easy it is to apply....your finger tips is all you need. With oily/combo skin, setting is a must! But once you set,  you will be glowing to the gaaaawwds! #HaloSkin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a smooth, creamy feel, looks great on and lasts all day. Very pleased with results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A nice moisturizer with light to medium coverage for a natural look. I may have ordered a shade too light, but it blends super well. My favorite use of this is to freshen up my foundation in the middle of the day. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It cuts down the time needed to look fresh and cute. It keeps the skin moisturized and doesn’t make you look cakey. Leaves a smooth and glistening/dewy look but not oily. Transfers easily. You will need concealer if you have trouble spots because it’s not full coverage. In my opinion, it wouldnt build up to full coverage and if that’s what you’re going after this is not it. If you need a quick moisturizing polish, this is perfect for you. For it’s price point, at $36. I would look elsewhere first. There are plenty of other products that do the same at the same quality for much cheaper. I personally would prefer to pay around $25 for this. Not almost $40.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fine product. It’s on me that, after using so many spf products that are mineral based, I didn’t notice that this is chemical-based (or at least partly). Chemical spfs can cause sensitivity issues with my finicky skin, so I’ve only used it a few times. It’s very light coverage and has a pretty finish. I will keep it and I have used it as a mix-in for more matte products.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - Light with a warm undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic tinted moisturizer for people looking for a subtle glow! Easily can build up in areas if needed. I prefer a brush if I’m going out, and a sponge if I want a “no makeup” look!

reviews.review_title: Radiant finish by itself & Flawless as A Primer!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tinted moisturizer felt more like a BB Cream, and my skin loved the formula! I’m surprised at the nice natural coverage it provided, it’s nicely pigmented and the skin feels really moisturized. I got the shade in Medium Tan. What is nice about this tinted moisturizer is that it has already the SPF you need to protect Your from the sun, plus you can use under foundation as a primer. I tried it by itself and as a primer and although I liked it it by itself I LOVED IT EVEN MORE AS A PRIMER!  It My matte foundation look radiant and it didn’t break apart neither I got greasy! I set the foundation with powder and I got the most amazing coverage without looking flat, it made it have a flawless finish!  This will be a favorite  for me, I’ll definitely keep using it by itself and under my foundation as a primer, especially in the upcoming Fall season and cooler weather. I’ll be able to wear it more since I like more of a dewy, moisturized skin... during the summer months I prefer more of a matte finish....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like this product a lot for those days you need a little something but don’t want a full foundation look, which for me is most days :) The shade sent to me was a little light for my summer skin, but with a little bronzer, blush, and highlight I felt glowy and ready to run around town.  It is a little heavier than other tinted moisturizers I have used, but covered dark spots like a foundation would so I’m not mad about it. I used a damp beauty blender to apply and it blends beautifully. I was sent this product complimentary for testing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. If you’re into natural coverage this is for you. Lasts well even in heat. Wore it for about 8 hours in the heat and it still looked nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really happy that this tinted moisturizer last against 90 degree weather. I love wearing tinted moisturizer because I don't want something too heavy and this blends like a dream ! I love how it makes me feel more confident too. It comes off easy as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: product is pretty good. I like the texture. the undertone was alittle off but this was a complimentary sample. worked well with my regular makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this tinted moisturizer. I am a longtime user of the Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer and if you use that, I would describe it to be lighter and less pigmented than this one. This smashbox moisturizer is aptly named Halo because it makes your skin glow! I used medium which was slightly darker than my skin tone, but it really covered my dark spots and hyper pigmentation which I've never seen a tinted moisturizer do before. I could also tell that it stayed on all day.   This has super buildable coverage and my coworkers thought i was glowing during zoom calls. I've had a few meetings where I needed to look particularly nice, but was too lazy to wear cake-up so I opted for this, some eyeshadow and maacara, which did the trick! I think the medium (even though slightly too dark) was perfect for summer, but I am definitely going to purchase the light for summer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - Medium with a warm undertone

reviews.review_text: This has a nice consistency too it. It covers really well too. I love the spf and that it's a moisturizer. It is a bit on the heavier side so if youre looking for super light then may want to not put too much of this on. But I would like to keep using this

Definitely use fingers to apply. I never have success using a beautify blender or brush with any tinted moisturizer. I received this product complimentary!

reviews.review_text: I received this product free to try. I wanted to love this product, but it is a little too heavy for my liking. This moisturizer covers everything.. Make sure you blend it in enough, or you may be a little streaky!

reviews.review_text: I love this for everyday! It has more coverage than I expected but it’s the perfect everyday tinted moisturizer!

reviews.review_text: I’ve always had pretty bad luck with tinted moisturizer. They always ended up too sheer and gave zero coverage. I was shocked when I used this and my makeup turned out fantastic! It gave me just the amount of coverage without me feeling like I had foundation on. I love how easily it applied and blended with all of my other products. If you’re in the market for a new tinted moisturizer I definitely suggest giving this one a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smashbox Halo Healthy Glow Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Honest Review   I definitely fell in love with this Tinted Moisturizer! Not only does it have a light-coverage tint & moisturize your skin just a bit, but also it has SPF 25 (sunscreen) which is EXTREMELY important to have on your face. I’m the type of person who hates putting on too much products on my face, because it causes my skin to break-out. But this product is super lightweight & it has that glow, natural finish. It’s very well worth if you’re just wanting a quick & natural look. It’s very liquid so it’s super easy to blend/spread onto your skin.   Rate: 10/10   I received this complementary product for testing purposes. All opinions expressed are solely my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this item. I was skeptical about tinted moisturizers due to unsuccessful attempts in the past. But, this changed my opinion. I was able to wear this lightweight dewy formula to a winery outing without heavyweight or oil building foundation and the SPF is definitely a bonus. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_text: This shade matched me so perfectly! I also love the glowy finish. It is perfect for when I want to go lighter on my makeup but need a little something. It is light coverage and has primer infused in it so it still looks like my skin, and I love that for these hot summer days when I don’t feel like wearing foundation.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this. It has been my go to. It is great for everyday use. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_text: I wish I could try this more, but the shade I got was too light with my summer tan, so this shade makes me look grey. But I love the formula, it’s super lightweight and I love the dewy finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not the type that wears makeup often so this was an awesome stepping stone for those that prefer a natural look with a hint of help from make up. It is very light weight with an added sunscreen! You can go anywhere with just this moisturizer and mascara on as it melts into skin so easily. The color match is PERFECT! Don’t hesitate to change out your favorite foundation for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this tinted moisturizer from smash box! It was perfect to use for a wedding I was attending. Even sweating in 90 degree weather it stayed put. I did have some acne breakout after using, but that could be due to the fact that I haven't been wearing any makeup these past few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. Let me start off by saying I did receive this complimentary from Influenster, however these are my honest thoughts.  I’ve always loved smashbox as I have super oily skin and their products always last. The color match is perfect for my medium skin tone! The tinted moisturizer is very light weight and feels like nothing on my skin. It’s medium coverage with a natural skin like finish. It lasts forever and I love the added sunscreen. This is my go to daily look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t wear makeup often and don’t really know how so this is an go to look for me! It is so easily applicable and has a dewey, natural finish. I love that it also has spf in it and plan to purchase it again! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this tinted moisturizer by smashbox! It was the perfect coverage for a hot summer day. I did have some acne breakout after using, but that could be due to the fact that I haven't been wearing any makeup these past few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great all in one moisturizer with SPF, acne fighting ingredients, and SPF. I wish I got a color closer to my shade but this will be great in the winter time!! It’s also not a very light moisturizer, since it does have a primer in it. It feels a bit thick

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - Light-medium with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this tinted moisturizer! It has just enough coverage for a hot summer day out and about. The color I received from influensteter is a little off but it was still great to try it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a person who has always wanted to try a foundation alternative, tinted moisturizers was something I really wanted to try. However, I could never could find a shade to match me. As a brown skinned woman with neutral undertones, it has been tough! There are not many neutral toned dark products out there and usually when they claim to be neutral they are always way off.  When I tried this product for the first time, I absolutely fell in love. It was a perfect color match and gave my skin a beautiful glow. This product covers any scars you may have and it is buildable. Since trying this product out I have already ordered a bottle because I don't want to run out. I am a very picky person when it comes to makeup. I had been wearing the same foundation shade and brand for 4 years because it matched my skin tone and I couldn't find anything else that did.  I love that this tinited moisturizer has a built in primer and it even has spf! My skin feels so moisturized after using it and it looks so natural.  I highly recommend this product to everyone and I will be purchasing this product over and over again. Advice: To any one who is trying this out for the first time, make sure to follow the instructions and shake well before you apply it. I also love applying a setting powder on days where I don't want as much of a glow, especially if it is hot outside.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - Tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the product overall but the shade wasn’t the best for me. I have a hard time with medium vs tan since I’m half Asian, half Italian. This felt lightweight and moisturizing, but it seems a bit heavier than my usual tinted moisturizer. I would go for a lighter more neutral color and give it another shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! Makes my skin look Dewey and hydrated with a healthy glow! I use this on its own when I want a simple, no makeup makeup look and I also use it under my foundation as a primer for days when I want to go full glam! I love that it has SPF cause I use it most of the time during the day. 10/10 recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the product was pretty good. I just thought that it should be a lighter coverage since it’s a tinted moisturizer. It was more like a full coverage foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the Beautycounter tinted moisturizer but I received this one as a gift from Influenster and was very pleasantly surprised.  A little goes a long way, leaves my skin dewy, and has mire coverage than the beautycounter one.  Due to the high coverage and the texture it can go on pretty streaky so you have to blend well.  Other than that I love it!! So easy to use, my make-up is done in no time!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - Medium-tan with a neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product !! I’ve started using this as a replacement for my foundation because it is so light and gives my skin the best glow! It’s so easy to apply and just melts into the skin. Perfect for no makeup makeup looks too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot tell a lie this product is revolutionary for my dry skin. It melts right in and you can use it as sunscreen or as a moisturizer without priming.  I went on a 2.5 week road trip and only brought this instead of foundation and I was not disappointed it’s buildable so reapplying it for sunscreen purposes is ideal. I received it free from influenster but I’m going to buy back ups. Great range and undertones
